AI Description: Trim Galore is a wrapper tool around Cutadapt and FastQC for quality and adapter trimming of Illumina reads. It removes low quality bases as well as adapter sequences from the 3' end of the reads.
Core Features: Quality Trimming, Adapter Trimming, Automated Read Processing, Integration With Cutadapt & Fastqc
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Genomics, Ngs Data Processing, Quality Control
